meteringrange: EV 0-20 (at 73Â°F/23Â°C with EF 50mm f/1.4 USM lens, ISO 100)
shutterspeeds: 1/8000 to 1/60 sec., X-sync at 1/200 sec. 1/8000 to 30 sec., bulb (Total shutter speed range. Available range varies by shooting mode)
exposurecompensation: Manual: Â±2 stops in 1/3- or 1/2-stop increments (can be combined with AEB)
imagetype: Still: JPEG, RAW (14-bit, Canon original), sRAW1, sRAW2, RAW+JPEG Video: MOV
drivemodes: Single, High-speed continuous, Low-speed continuous and Self-timer (10-sec. or 2-sec. delay)
externalflashsettings: Flash function settings, Flash C.Fn settings
picturestyle: Standard, Portrait, Landscape, Neutral, Faithful, Monochrome, User Def. 1-3
viewfindermirror: Quick-return half mirror (transmission: reflection ratio of 40:60, no mirror cutoff with EF600mm f/4L IS USM or shorter lenses)
recordingfunctions: With the              WFT-E4A attached, image recording to the CF card and to the USB              external media connected to the WFT-E4A will be possible as follows: (1) Standard, (2) Automatic switching of recording media, (3) Separate recordings according to image-recording quality, (4) Recording images having the same size
exposurecontrol: Program AE              (Shiftable), Shutter-priority AE, Aperture-priority AE, Creative Auto,              Full auto, Manual exposure, E-TTL II autoflash program AE
afassistbeam: When an external              EOS-dedicated Speedlite is attached to the camera, the AF-assist beam              from the Speedlite will be emitted when necessary
isospeedrecommendedexposureindex: Automatically set, ISO 100-6400 (in 1/3-stop or 1-stop increments) Basic Zone modes: ISO 100-3200 set automatically Extension settable (with C.Fn.I-3-1): ISO 50 (L), 12800 (H1), 25600 (H2) High Tone Priority settable: ISO 200-1600
aelock: Auto: Applied in One-Shot AF mode with evaluative metering when focus is achieved Manual: By AE lock button
colortemperaturecompensation: White balance correction: Â±9 stops in full-stop increments White balance bracketing: Â±3 stops in full-stop increments Blue/amber direction or magenta/green direction possible
imageprotect: Single images can be erase-protected or not
imagesensortype: High-sensitivity, high-resolution, large single-plate CMOS sensor
shootingmodes: Still photo shooting and video shooting
camerausersettings: Register under Mode Dial's C1 and C3 positions
powersaving: Provided; Power turns off after 1, 2, 4, 8, 15 or 30 min.
interfacelanguages: 25              (English, German, French, Dutch, Danish, Portuguese, Finnish, Italian,              Norwegian, Swedish, Spanish, Greek, Russian, Polish, Czech, Hungarian,              15/15 Romanian, Ukraine, Turkish, Arabic, Thai, Simplified/Traditional              Chinese, Korean, Japanese)
battery: One Battery Pack LP-E6 AC power can be supplied via AC Adapter Kit ACK-E6 with Battery Grip BG-E6 attached
compatibleimages: JPEG and RAW images Only JPEG images can be transferred as wallpaper on the personal computer screen
recordingmedia: CF Card Type I              and II, UDMA-compliant CF cards, via external media (USB v.2.0 hard              drive, via optional Wireless File Transmitter WFT-E4A)
size: (1) Large/Fine: Approx. 6.1MB (5616 x 3744 pixels) (2) Large/Normal: Approx. 3.0MB (5616 x 3744 pixels) (3) Medium/Fine: Approx. 3.6MB (4080 x 2720 pixels) (4) Medium/Normal: Approx. 1.9MB (4080 x 2720 pixels) (5) Small/Fine: Approx. 2.1MB (2784 x 1856 pixels) (6) Small/Normal: Approx. 1.0MB (2784 x 1856 pixels) (7) RAW: Approx. 25.8MB (5616 x 3744 pixels) (8) sRAW 1: Approx. 14.8MB (3861 x 2574 pixels) (9) sRAW 2: Approx. 10.8MB (2784 x 1856 pixels)
recordingformat: Design rule for Camera File System 2.0
filenumbering: Consecutive numbering, auto reset, manual reset Possible to create new folders and select folders in the CF card
focusingscreen: Interchangeable (Eg-D: Grid lines, Eg-S [point of Focus], Eg-A standard focusing screen provided
focusing: Quick mode (Phase-difference detection) Live mode/Face Detection Live mode (Contrast detection) Manual focusing (5x/10x magnification possible)
dustdeletionfeature: (1) Automatic sensor cleaning (2) Manual cleaning of sensor (3) Dust Delete Data appended to the captured image
focusingmodes: Auto, One-Shot AF, Predictive AI Servo AF, AI Focus AF, Manual focusing (MF)
usbterminal: For personal computer communication and direct printing (USB 2.0 Hi-Speed)
autowhitebalance: Auto white balance with the image sensor
selectedafpointdisplay: Superimposed in viewfinder and indicated on LCD panel
videooutterminal: (1) Video OUT terminal: NTSC/PAL selectable (2) HDMI mini OUT terminal
meteringmodes: Evaluative metering with the image sensor (still photos) Center-weighted average metering (video)
printableimages: JPEG images              compliant to Design rule for Camera File System (DPOF printing              possible) and RAW/sRAW images captured with the EOS 5D Mark II
imageplaybackdisplayformat: Single              image, Single image + Image-recording quality/shooting information,              histogram, 4- or 9-image index, magnified view (approx. 1.5x-10x),              rotated image (auto/manual), image jump (by 10/100 images, index              screen, by shooting date, by folder), slide show (all images/selected              by date/folder)
lowpassfilter: Fixed position in front of the CMOS sensor
imageerase: Single image, check-marked images or all images in the CF card can be erased (except protected images)
viewfinderinformation: AF              information (AF points, focus confirmation light), Exposure information              (shutter speed, aperture, ISO speed, AE lock, exposure level, spot              metering circle), Flash information (flash ready, flash exposure              compensation, High-speed sync, FE lock), Image information (Highlight              tone priority, monochrome shooting, maximum burst, white balance              correction, CF card information), battery information
maximumburst: JPEG (Large/Fine): approx. 78 (CF)/approx. 310 (UDMA CF) RAW: approx. 13/approx. 14 (UDMA CF) RAW+JPEG (Large/Fine): approx. 8 (CF/UDMA CF) Based on Canon's testing standards with a 2GB CF card, high-speed continuous shooting, ISO 100 and Standard Picture Style Varies depending on the subject, CF card brand, image-recording quality, ISO speed, drive mode, Picture Style, etc.
